duties_responsibilities.duty: Continual, tactical communication with external and internal customers to facilitate freight movements.
Develop and implement performance metrics for driving business results.
Lead initiatives to re-engineer business processes and drive efficiency in transportation operations.
Scoping business and functional requirements for software systems and tools used.
Identify gaps in processes and implement solutions to ensure operational excellence.
Manage labor planning, customer satisfaction, and employee development.
Author and present findings related to performance metrics and variances to goals.
Own process improvements to contribute to growing the Amazon Freight business and capabilities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent in Supply Chain Management, Logistics, or related field (Master's preferred)
